detaileddescription.para: The default delta time function returns the delta time in milliseconds.
The default character type used in the congfx programs are wide characters (wchar_t).
The default string type used in the congfx programs are wide strings (wchar_t).
The default integer type used in the congfx programs are long integers (long).
The default unsigned integer type used in the congfx programs are unsigned long integers (unsigned long).
The default number type used in the congfx programs are long double (long double).
The default vector type used in the congfx programs are arrays of long double (long double *).
Compare two colours.

simplesect.para: 0 if the colours are equal, -1 otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Enable raw mode for the terminal. see https://viewsourcecode.org/snaptoken/kilo/02.enteringRawMode.html
Disable raw mode for the terminal. see https://viewsourcecode.org/snaptoken/kilo/02.enteringRawMode.html

Expand the command buffer for the terminal.
Dispose of a command buffer for the terminal.

parameterdescription.para: The command buffer to dispose of.

detaileddescription.para: Add a command to the command buffer for the terminal.

parameterdescription.para: The command buffer to add to.
The length of the command. (if 0, then the length is calculated)

detaileddescription.para: Flush the command buffer for the terminal. The commands are written to the terminal, and the buffer is reset.
Reset the terminal to its default state.

Get the cursor position in the terminal. see https://viewsourcecode.org/snaptoken/kilo/03.rawInputAndOutput.html#window-size-the-hard-way
rows
The row position of the cursor.
cols
The column position of the cursor.
0 if successful, -1 otherwise.

rows
The number of rows in the terminal.
cols
The number of columns in the terminal.
0 if successful, -1 otherwise.
Read a key press from the terminal.

simplesect.para: The difference in time in microseconds.

briefdescription.para: A simple graphics library for the terminal.
